___tooltip.description: tooltip for the quality metric to be displayed upon mouseover
___tooltip.title: Tooltip for the Quality Metric

___value.description: value of the quality metric as a string
___value.title: Value of the Quality Metric

override_assay_info.description: Information that helps distinguish the assay eg. ChIP-seq target or repliseq phase
override_assay_info.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

override_experiment_bucket.description: Where does a file sit in an experiment or set
override_experiment_bucket.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

description.description: A plain text description of the file.
description.title: Description

notes_to_tsv.desciption: Additional information intended to be shown in the metadata.tsv file
notes_to_tsv.comment: value will be used to include notes in the metadata.tsv file

override_dataset.description: What dataset does the file belong to
override_dataset.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

content_md5sum.description: The MD5sum of the uncompressed file.
content_md5sum.comment: This is only relavant for gzipped files.
content_md5sum.title: Content MD5sum

file_classification.internal_comment: This will control how, when and where a file can be displayed - on pages (eg. ancillary files like index files will show up in workflow_run but not experiment)
file_classification.description: General classification group for the File (raw, processed, ancillary (eg. index files))
file_classification.title: General Classification

file_size.comment: File size is specified in bytes - presumably this can be a calculated property as well
file_size.title: File Size

override_biosource_name.description: The name of the cell line or tissue sample for this track
override_biosource_name.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

___relationship_type.description: A controlled term specifying the relationship between files.
___relationship_type.title: Relationship Type

override_condition.description: What condition distinguishes the members of a dataset
override_condition.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

filename.description: The local file name used at time of submission. Must be alphanumeric, with the exception of the following special characters: '+=,.@-_'
filename.comment: ultimately uploaded filename will be uuid/accession, but filename with no directory will be store in metadata as passed in
filename.title: File Name

override_replicate_info.description: Information on which replicate this file belongs
override_replicate_info.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

md5sum.description: The md5sum of the file being transferred.
md5sum.comment: This can vary for files of same content gzipped at different times
md5sum.title: MD5sum

restricted.description: A flag to indicate whether this file is subject to restricted access
restricted.title: Is Restricted File

file_type.description: The type of file based on the information in the file.
file_type.title: File Type

override_lab_name.description: The lab that did the experiment if not the attributed Lab from whence this file
override_lab_name.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

override_experiment_type.description: The type of experiment to which this file is associated
override_experiment_type.comment: value will be used to populate the calculated property value of the same name w/o underscore (in this case in track_and_facet_info calcprop)

extra_files.description: Links to extra files on s3 that don't have associated metadata
extra_files.title: Extra Files

___file_size.description: Size of file of the extra file.
___file_size.comment: File size is specified in bytes
___file_size.title: File Size

___md5sum.description: The md5sum of the extra file.
___md5sum.title: MD5sum

track_and_facet_info.assay_info.description: Details of the experiment to which this file belongs
track_and_facet_info.assay_info.title: Assay Details

file_type.title: File Type
file_type.descripton: Type or categorization of this file.

file_size.description: Filter using range of size of the file
file_size.title: File Size

file_format.file_format.description: Format of the file, i.e. the file extension.
file_format.file_format.title: File Format

track_and_facet_info.experiment_type.description: Type of experiment to which this file belongs
track_and_facet_info.experiment_type.title: Experiment Type

public_release.comment: disabled flag may be removed after we can handle ranges in URI filters.
public_release.title: Public Release Date

track_and_facet_info.dataset.description: Dataset to which this file belongs
track_and_facet_info.dataset.title: Dataset

track_and_facet_info.condition.description: Condition that distinguishes this replicate set from others in the dataset
track_and_facet_info.condition.title: Condition

track_and_facet_info.assay_info.description: Details of the experiment to which this file belongs
track_and_facet_info.assay_info.title: Assay Details

track_and_facet_info.experiment_type.description: Type of experiment to which this file belongs
track_and_facet_info.experiment_type.title: Experiment Type

description: Raw DNA sequncing file details and file in fastq.gz format.
title: FASTQ file

___instrument.internal_comment: should this be a controlled CV with enum, or another object?
___instrument.title: Sequencer

___file_first_line.description: First line of the fastq file
___file_first_line.title: First line of the fastq file

___paired_end.description: Which pair the file belongs to (if paired end library)
___paired_end.title: Paired End Identifier

___file_type.description: The type of file based on the information in the file.
___file_type.title: File Type

___flowcell_details.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the flowcells used for the sequencing of the replicate.
___flowcell_details.title: Flowcells

___barcode_position.description: The 1-based start position of the barcode in 5->3 orientation.
___barcode_position.title: Barcode Position

___barcode_in_read.description: The read the barcode is located on.
___barcode_in_read.title: Barcode in Read

___chunk.description: The file chunk label as assigned by Illumina software when splitting up a fastq into specified chunk sizes.
___chunk.comment: This label is used to re-assemble the chunks into the original file in the correct order.
___chunk.title: Chunk

___machine.description: The lab specific name of the machine used.
___machine.title: Machine Name

___read_length.description: Length of sequencing reads in base pairs for fastq files
___read_length.title: Sequencing Read Length (bp)

___beta_actin_sense_count.description: Number of reads that match a 21kmer of the Beta-actin encoding gene in the sense strand (RNA-seq experiments)
___beta_actin_sense_count.title: Beta-actin count in the sense strand

___beta_actin_antisense_count.description: Number of reads that match a 21kmer of the Beta-actin encoding gene in the anti-sense strand (RNA-seq experiments)
___beta_actin_antisense_count.title: Beta-actin count in the anti-sense strand
